briefTitle: Preoperative and Intraoperative Quantification of Axillary Tumoral Load
officialTitle: Preoperative and Intraoperative Quantification of Axillary Tumoral Load to Reduce the Need of Axillary Lymph Node Dissection in Breast Cancer Patients With Positive Lymph-nodes at Diagnosis
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Breast cancer patients with infiltrated axillary lymph nodes cT1-4 cN1
* Older than 18 years old
* Able to understand and accept the protocol procedure and to sign an informed consent form in accordance with national legislation.

Exclusion Criteria:

* Breast cancer patients in whom no information about axillary lymph nodes status (cytology or biopsy) is available.
* Patients younger than 18 years old.
* Psychiatric disease
* Difficulties to understand Spanish.
